mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUCTIONITEM (ITEMID, PRODUCTID, LISTPRICE, UNITCOST, SUPPLIER, STATUS, ATTR1, ATTR2, ATTR3, ATTR4, ATTR5, BUYERID, DUETIME, DESCRIPTION, COMPANYSUPPLIER, CATEGORYID) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{productId}, #{listprice}, #{unitcost}, #{supplier}, #{status}, #{attr1}, #{attr2}, #{attr3}, #{attr4}, #{attr5}, #{buyerId}, #{dueTime}, #{description}, #{companySupplier}, #{categoryId})
INSERT INTO BUYER (USERNAME, ITEMID, LISTPRICE) VALUES (#{username}, #{itemId}, #{listprice})
mapper.select: SELECT b.username as username, b.itemId as itemId, max(b.listprice) as myPrice, a.categoryId as categoryId, a.listprice as nowPrice, a.dueTime as dueTime FROM BUYER b, AUCTIONITEM a WHERE b.itemId=a.itemId AND b.username=#{username} GROUP BY username, itemId
SELECT username, itemId, max(listprice) as listprice FROM BUYER WHERE itemId=#{itemId} AND username=#{username} GROUP BY username, itemId
